brainly_data.question: Critically evaluate four dangers of engaging in social media relationships
brainly_data.subject: Social studies

all_answers.question: Critically evaluate four dangers of engaging in social media relationships
all_answers.subject: Social studies
all_answers.text: 1. is information theft wherein someone you meet online can steal your identity. 2. social media relationships can open you to predators. 3. social media relationships can open you to hackers that spread viruses through those means. 4. social media relationships can hurt you emotionally when they don't work out
